item.title: Python Environment
item.description: Create and start Python Virtual Environment python3 -m venv venv source venv/bin/activate To install a local requirements.txt venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt venv/bin/pip install gunicorn To Exit Venv deactivate To create requirements.txt pip freeze > requirements.txt To remove installed plugins pip freeze | xargs pip uninstall -y To run flask app flask app.py
